snippet.title: FEROCIOUS –  Official Mecha Trailer | Games Baked in Germany Showcase
snippet.description:
Dive into FEROCIOUS, an immersive, action-packed, old-school first-person shooter. Your adventure begins after a shipwreck in the uncharted waters of the Pacific Ocean, where you awaken on the shores of a deadly island. Your priority is to locate your missing brother but as you venture deeper, it becomes evident that you’re not the only human being around. Mercenaries infest the land, setting the stage for a game of stealth, strategy, and survival. The situation is grim enough without considering the island's prehistoric residents, that also demand you respect…
Head over to Steam and wishlist FEROCIOUS now!: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1645630/FEROCIOUS/
